doc:
Helen Rowland (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Rowland_(actress) 0 Helen Rowland (sometimes credited as Baby Helen Rowland or, from the character she played in her second film, Baby Helen Lee; born ca 1919) is an American child actress in silent films in the 1920s. She appeared in at least nine films between 1922 and 1927. Her first film was a 1922 adaptation of George Eliot's 1861 novel Silas Marner. Helen_Rowland ( sometimes_credited as Baby_Helen_Rowland or , from the_character she played in her_second_film , Baby_Helen_Lee ; born ca_1919 ) is an_American_child_actress in silent_films in the_1920s . She appeared in at_least_nine_films between 1922_and_1927 . Her_first_film was a_1922_adaptation of George_Eliot 's_1861_novel_Silas_Marner .
